caller_intent: The caller, representing Covenant, is addressing a delayed claim payment caused by an adjusting firm's inefficiencies and seeks assurance that the claim will be prioritized. They also mention discussing updates to the hotel program.
resolution_steps: Agent acknowledges the claim delay and confirms Brian (likely a colleague) has the issue on his priority list.
Agent explains that while immediate payment isn't possible, attention will be directed to the claim.
Agent shifts to discussing the hotel program update, including a new fronting carrier and reinsurance progress.
summary: A Covenant broker discusses a 120-day delayed claim caused by an adjusting firm's structural engineer requirement and requests prioritization. The agent confirms Brian's involvement and mentions upcoming hotel program updates, including a new fronting carrier. The call transitions from problem resolution to business updates.
